data.eml:eml: Two new species of Glyphocrangon (Decapoda: Caridea: Glyphocrangonidae) from the East China Sea and the Philippines

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Han, Qingxi, Li, Xinzheng (2014): Two new species of Glyphocrangon (Decapoda: Caridea: Glyphocrangonidae) from the East China Sea and the Philippines. Zootaxa 3852 (4): 438-444, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3852.4.2
